name: Dual Shrew Panic!
description:
ALT+ENTER FOR FULLSCREEN

Using Snake as a base, Dual Shrew Panic doubles the fun by doubling the stress!

  • Control TWO Shrews!
  • Eat chocolate!
  • Unlock every difficulty!
  • Don't EAT your young!
  • no seriously
  • that would be messed up
  • UNLOCK 3 extra difficulties!
  • CAPITALIZED PLACEHOLDER
